title: Pet-Friendly, Online Rent Payment, Gated Community
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 6', 'OR Text', '6', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 793-798 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Chateau Avalon places our residents in the ideal location of North Austin, right off Lamar Blvd near I35 and 183.', 'While you have the space to relax, we are only 15 minutes from the heart of downtown Austin, where you can enjoy music, entertainment and dining.', "Enjoy amenities that you can't find in the city, such as a resort-style swimming pool, outdoor seating area, a comfortable resident lounge and private gated parking.", 'Our two bedroom apartments boast wood-burning fireplaces, black appliances, washer and dryer connections, spacious balconies and we welcome all furry friends under 25 lbs!', 'Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is more than happy to help out with anything you may need.', 'Need something outside of regular business hours?', 'No worries, our online Resident Portal is there for rent payments and maintenance requests- 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.', "If you’ve been searching for a pet-friendly two bedroom apartment in Austin that's sophisticated and conveniently located, your search ends at Chateau Avalon.", 'Stop in and have a no-strings-attached look around the property to check us out!', 'Features:', 'Track Lighting, Black Appliances, Vinyl Plank Flooring, Stone Fireplace Wall, Eat-In Kitchen, Wood-Burning Fireplaces, Full-Size Washer Dryer Connections', 'Community Amenities:', 'Cabana, Online Rent Payment, Pet-Friendly, Resort-Style Swimming Pool, On-Site Parking, Gated Community, Private Patios & Balconies', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Restrictions: 25lb weight limit.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'h58k7psKa8F']
